Specimen Type: Serum, Plasma, Whole blood, Urine, Cerebrospinal Fluid (CSF)
Purpose: Standardized analytical procedures for assorted Quest Diagnostics/Nichols Institute tests to ensure accurate results, validation, and appropriate corrective action.
Container: Appropriate specimen-specific containers (e.g., serum separator tube, EDTA or heparin tube, sterile urine or CSF container) following standard collection guidelines
Equipment: Analytical platforms/instruments, calibrated pipettes and tips, Quest/Nichols test-specific reagents, and applicable controls
